title: Can I just walk away without saying anything? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, it’s definitely not okay to leave without reasoning it out and that’s not a good etiquette as it leaves the other person in dilemma of what they have done to you! If that’s a case with you then: Try to make the other person understand of your views and be firm and practical while explaining the things. Don’t just run away from things. Be a Bravo :) If someone has done that to you: Try thinking, may be if they would have said you the reason to leave you, you might have got hurt worse. Thinking this, may be they don’t want to worsen things and lack the patience to deal with the situation, they might have left. Just because you are good to one, you can’t expect the other to be the same. It’s as insane as that just because you don’t eat Lion, you expect it not to eat you up.  It hurts initially, but don’t give your Brain the power to control you for the things that others have done to you! Be smart of not wasting your time for something that someone has done to you. As our ultimate goal should be to live at peace happily :) Cheers!
